snippet.title: Mission Z - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
In Mission Z you will live the story of Raphael, who will discover ZPriot facing Martin's soldiers, with many challenges and emotions.
You decide the way you play, whether you want to go quieter, without drawing too much attention, or whether you want to take the fight and take action.
All of this in an open world map where you can explore various environments, with various enemies, various equipment, stores and items, to help you complete your objectives.
Come live the emotions and adventures of survivalism!
Find and trade items, fight, survive and save the ZPriot region in Mission Z.

Available now on Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1401750/Mission_Z
